name: Muttnik
description:
When a commercial airline pilot goes rogue to fulfill their life long dream of becoming an astronaut, all the luggage is discarded - including a poor Shiba. Jump from suitcase to suitcase in hopes of rejoining his master and becoming Mutnik!

Created for the 2018 Wolverine Soft Pumpkin Jam by:

  • Noah Ehmann
  • Alexander Okros
  • Tyler Del Rose
  • Evan Brisita
